body_html: It looks like the anaconda/mkl pacakge doesn't include libmkl_gnu_thread, but the intel/mkl package does. We could switch to that, but that forces a few other packages (like pillow) to downgrade since they seem to depend on anaconda/mkl.
body_text: It looks like the anaconda/mkl pacakge doesn't include libmkl_gnu_thread, but the intel/mkl package does. We could switch to that, but that forces a few other packages (like pillow) to downgrade since they seem to depend on anaconda/mkl.
body: It looks like the `anaconda/mkl` pacakge doesn't include `libmkl_gnu_thread`, but the `intel/mkl` package does. We could switch to that, but that forces a few other packages (like pillow) to downgrade since they seem to depend on anaconda/mkl.
